Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Related incident https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/3s8cs8pm3dkq

entry.title: [LIM][Network] - LoadBalancer Update
entry.content:
Dec 26, 15:43 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Please note that this update will add support for TLS 1.3 as well as strict compliance with RFC7540.
Particularly on section 8.1.2 which implies that our services will answer http responses with lowercase headers.

Dec 26, 13:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 26, 10:31 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/12/2023 13:00 UTC
End time : 26/12/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are updating the loadbalancer configuration in front of storage.de.cloud.ovh.net and gateways.storage.de.cloud.ovh.net.
DNS records will be updated.

entry.title: [Global][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Kubernetes Service update
entry.content:
Dec 21, 16:33 UTC
Completed - The current maintenance has been postponed.

Dec 19, 10:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 19, 09:26 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/12/2023 10:00 UTC
End time : 21/12/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Ongoing actions : This maintenance is scheduled to upgrade all clusters with a policy update configured by the customer to ALWAYS UPDATE (through the API Ovhcloud console) or to MAXIMUM SECURITY (through the Manager UI interface).
With this maintenance, we will upgrade all concerned MKS services to the latest patch version provided by our team. For more details, please refer to the documentation
